newsitem.title: USA: PacifiCorp extends Energy Group offer.
newsitem.headline: PacifiCorp extends Energy Group offer.

text.p: PacifiCorp said Wednesday its cash offer for The Energy Group Plc will remain open until 1000 EDT Aug 12, and possibly to Aug 29.
As of 1000 Tuesday, the original expiration date of the offer, PacifiCorp said holders of 61.64 percent of Energy Group shares had accepted it.
PacifiCorp noted the offer could be extended past Aug 29 with the consent of regulatory authorities in the U.K.
In mid-June, the U.S. company offered 690 pence per Energy Group share or 27.60 pounds per Energy Group American Depository Share.
Wednedsay, Energy Group's stock closed at 656 pence on London Stock Exchange.
